ENTRY.SYNOPSIS: Remove a link between model parameters

DESC.PARA: The unlink command removes a link between two model parameters.

LIST.ITEM: par - the model parameter to unlink

DESC.PARA: When a link is removed between two model parameters, the parameter value is set to that of the parameter to which it had been linked. When a link is removed between a model parameter and a model stack, the parameter is set to the value it had before that link was established.

A link between two model parameters is established using the link command
("ahelp link").
Link the amplitudes of two Gaussian models, then remove the link.
Create a link to a model expression, then remove the link.
